timeline.bodyText: Please format whitespace here according to the rest of the file (space before and after keywords, between ) and { and no inner space in () expressions.
timeline.author: kroepke

timeline.bodyText:
Both this and the next line warn about Casting 'leftValue' to 'String' may produce 'ClassCastException'.
While technically the code cannot throw that exception (leftValue is a string because we checked and rightValue has to be a string, too, because of the parser/typechecker checks, we try to avoid warnings in code when possible.
My suggestion would be to rewrite this as String.valueOf(leftValue) to be future proof.
timeline.author: kroepke
kroepke
